greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = 2^n mod 17.
comment: Terms of the simple continued fraction of 678982/(sqrt(10997122748477) - 2846611). - _Paolo P. Lava_, Aug 06 2009
reference: I. M. Vinogradov, Elements of Number Theory, pp. 220 ff.
link: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,0,0,-1,1).
formula: a(n) = 17 - a(n+4) = a(n+8) for all n in Z. - _Michael Somos_, Oct 17 2018
program: (PARI) { for (n=0, 1000, write("b062116.txt", n, " ", 2^n%17) ) } \\ _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 01 2009
(Sage) [power_mod(2,n,17) for n in range(0,87)] # _Zerinvary Lajos_, Nov 03 2009
(MAGMA) [2^n mod 17: n in [0..100]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Oct 16 2018
results.author: _Olivier Gérard_, Jun 06 2001
